Package tk.shardsoftware.util

Class Bar

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.shardsoftware.util.Bar
  • public class Bar
extends java.lang.Object
    Facilitates drawing UI bars to the screen, e.g a health-bar.
    Author:
    Hector Woods, James Burnell

      • drawBar

        public static void drawBar​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer shapeRenderer,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 start,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 end,
                           float p,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color backgroundColor,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color foreGroundColor)
        Draw a bar, specifying the background and foreground colors and the proportion of the bar to fill.
        Parameters:
        batch - The SpriteBatch to draw with
        shapeRenderer - The ShapeRenderer to render rectLine with
        start - The start of the bar
        end - The end of the bar
        p - The proportion of the bar to fill
        backgroundColor - The background color
        foreGroundColor - The color of the bar

      • drawBar

        public static void drawBar​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer shapeRenderer,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 start,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 end,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color backgroundColor,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color foreGroundColor)
        Draw a bar, specifying the background/foreground colors and filling the whole bar
        Parameters:
        batch - The SpriteBatch to draw with
        shapeRenderer - The ShapeRenderer to render rectLine with
        start - The start of the bar
        end - The end of the bar
        backgroundColor - the color of the empty bar
        foreGroundColor - the color to display on top of the empty bar
